description:
Stelly, Sabo’s adopted brother and now the king of the Goa Kingdom, walks up to Garp who is escorting the royal family of the Fish-Man Island, with an air of importance and something up his sleeve. Meanwhile, Shirahoshi sees the surface world for the first time.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ihrem Traum ein Stück näher! – Shirahoshis Weg zur Sonne!
One Step Forward for Her Dream! Shirahoshi Goes Out in the Sun!
Plus près de son rêve. Shirahoshi sous le soleil
Un paso por delante del sueño: ¡El camino de Shirahoshi hacia el Sol!
Yume no Ippo: Shirahoshi Taiyou no Shita e!
Один шаг к её мечте! Ширахоши выходит на солнечный свет!
‫خطوة إلى الأمام نحو حلمها! شيراهوشي تخرج إلى الشمس!
夢の一歩 しらほし太陽の下へ!
